events.message: I am reporting damage to my roof caused by the recent severe storm that passed through our area last night.
The claim has been categorised under Home Damage due to roof and structural damage caused by wind and rain.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your storm damage claim and will guide you through the process.
We acknowledge receipt of your damage claim related to the storm. Our team is committed to assisting you promptly.
Please provide photos of the damaged areas of your roof and any repair estimates from licensed contractors.
I have uploaded all requested photos of the roof damage along with the official contractor quotes for repairs.
Our claims investigation team has begun assessing the submitted documents and scheduling an on-site inspection.
The investigation is complete following an on-site review, confirming the storm caused extensive damage to the property.
A settlement offer has been proposed covering repair costs up to the policy limits for your home damage claim.
I appreciate the quick handling of my claim and feel the proposed settlement amount is fair and reasonable.
Your claim has been officially approved based on the investigation and your acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment has been issued to cover the repair expenses for the damage sustained to your home.
The claim related to your storm-damaged roof is now closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
All records and documentation regarding your home damage claim have been archived for any future reference.
